statements: UPDATE customer_churn_analysis SET churn_status = TRUE WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

UPDATE customer_churn_analysis SET churn_status = true WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE customer_churn_analysis SET usage_data = '{"data": {"total_usage": 1500}}', demographic_info = '{"age": 35, "gender": "male"}' WHERE customer_id = '876e1234-a89b-12d3-a456-426614174567';
UPDATE customers SET age = 30, city = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 12345;
